item.description:
The Improv Asylum has been called Boston's Best Comedy Show. It is a great way to finish up the work week. We will watch the 10:00PM show. If that wasn't enough laughter we will be able to stay and enjoy the midnight show for FREE. Join us for a night of uncontrollable laughter.

Tickets may be purchased on-line or by calling the Improv Asylum directly.


http://www.improvasyl...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the waiting area. Don't be shy, come on up & say HI !!
item.name: Asylum Fun
